Procedures/interventions should be carried out under general or local anaesthesia, unless it is considered inappropriate because:

  • It is more traumatic for the animal than the procedure/intervention itself.
  • It is incompatible with the purposes of the procedure/intervention (art, 26.1 Royal Decree 53/13).

Procedures/interventions involving serious injuries that may cause severe pain will not be carried out without anaesthesia (art, 26.3 Royal Decree 53/13).
Will anaesthesia be used at any time during the experimentation process?
Note: please remember that exceptions require providing the respective document in section '5.4 Special situations'.
